info.name: FileServe - Clean Download Page (April 2012)
info.description: Hides everything but the download button on the fileserve.com download page.
info.additionalInfo:
/* +++ changelog +++
April 16th, 2012
- fixed it
March 29th, 2011
- Hides "CountDown Banner" Ad
- Hides "upgrade to Premium account now." On The "Your download link has expired" Page
- Hides "Download with Fileserve Manager"
March 19th, 2011
- Fixed, was accidentally hiding error messages
March 3rd, 2011
- Hides "At Maximum Speed" Ad On Download Page
- Fixed Hiding Of "Free User Speed Graph"
Dec 3rd, 2010
- Original Release
*/
